name: Connect It: What is your Train of Thought
name_original: Connect It: What is your Train of Thought
description:
Do you have that one friend that is really random? Do you wonder how their brain works? Well so do we!

Connect It is a party game designed for those with a creative train of thought. The more creative the better! So gather your friends and compete to find the best way to link two items!

Connect It will provide you with two random items. You must use exactly two things between the provided items to connect them.
